headline: Tigress Financial Assigns International Flavors & Fragrances (IFF) a Buy Rating
summary: International Flavors & Fragrances Inc. (NYSE:IFF) is one of the 11 Best Food Stocks to Buy According to Wall Street Analysts. On June 4, Tigress Financial Partners initiated coverage on International Flavors & Fragrances Inc. (NYSE:IFF), assigning a “Buy” rating and setting a price target of $105. headline: IFF Expands Innovation Center in Singapore with New Immersive Experience Hub
summary: SINGAPORE, July 10, 2025--IFF (NYSE: IFF)—a global leader in flavors, fragrances, food ingredients, health and biosciences—today unveiled its new Immersive Experience Hub located within its Singapore Innovation Center. The multi-sensory facility enables IFF to work alongside customers to conceptualize, test, and refine product ideas in simulated real-world environments—enhancing decision-making, shortening development timelines and improving go-to-market success.
